publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-3774 Dr Jean Turner: Forward Training Partnership Ltd’s Christmas Lunch—That the Parliament congratulates the staff and seven teenagers who are participating in Forward Training Partnership Ltd, established in 1997 to provide training for 16 to 62-year-olds in numerous NVQs, for successfully preparing a full Christmas lunch which was served in Campsie Memorial Hall, Lennoxtown, to seven pensioners chosen from their community.
S2M-3774 Forward Training Partnership Ltd’s Christmas Lunch (lodged on 23 December 2005) John Swinburne*

S2M-3774 Forward Training Partnership Ltd’s Christmas Lunch (lodged on 23 December 2005) Bruce Crawford*, Ms Rosemary Byrne*, Shiona Baird*, Frances Curran*, Eleanor Scott*, Ms Sandra White*, Patrick Harvie*
S2M-3774 Forward Training Partnership Ltd’s Christmas Lunch (lodged on 23 December 2005) Mr Jamie Stone*
S2M-3774 Forward Training Partnership Ltd’s Christmas Lunch (lodged on 23 December 2005) Chris Ballance*
